basics.name: MOHAMMED IBTHEHAZ SHAHARIER FAYED
basics.label: Client Relations & Operations Executive
basics.summary: I am a detail-oriented and tech-savvy graduate with a strong foundation in communication and client servicing.

work.name: Tazim Travels (In Association with Worldlink Tours & Travels)
work.summary: As a Client Relations & Operations Executive at Tazim Travels in Chattogram, Bangladesh, from April 2023 to February 2025, i have handled overseas client communication and inquiries, managed travel documentation, ensured smooth customer service and issue resolution, and collaborated with internal teams to optimize workflow. I am also familiar with tools such as Zapier, ClickUp, Make.com, Brevo Email Campaigns, Lead Generation Tools, and BambooHR.

work.name: Ulterior Engineering & Research Institute
work.summary: During my time as a Student Services Intern at Ulterior Engineering & Research Institute in Chattogram, Bangladesh, from March 2021 to September 2022, i assisted with administrative tasks and student-related communications. I have also coordinated learning sessions, handled academic queries, and gained experience in service delivery and organizational support.

volunteer.summary: Contributing to open-source projects and helping maintain documentation.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A personal website showcasing my work and skills.
highlights: Built with love using the Astrolio template
Responsive design using Astro, Typescript, and Ninja Keys
Integrated with GitHub API to display projects
Employed the JSON Resume format for easy updates
